name: Eight Channel Module
summary: An 8CM file is a module created by Triton Fasttracker that contains multiple audio tracks with eight channels. It is saved in the proprietary Eight Channel Module (8CM) format, allowing users to compose music or sound effects with eight separate audio channels. Throughout the 1990s, musicians and game developers often used Fasttracker to produce electronic music and game audio.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
